name: Shadow Asteroid
description:
IMPORTANT SHIT: i actually forget too put the music in the game so it doesn't have music but in the next build i'll put it

Shadow Asteroid, a game made in just one week (and a few days) , for the Bullet Hell Jam.

Shadow Asteroid is a bullet hell where you control a little spaceship and there's a big spaceship what is not symetric and want to kill the little spaceship for being a good character and having a good design. Every 10 seconds, the game will change to a random attack (that means a lot of bugs).

Credits: 

Goncholito (Art & Programming)

Parker Walrker (Music)
